description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Unified sidebar navigation and workspace switching behavior for a more consistent session flow.
- Added download throttling to prevent UI freezes during large transfer activity.
Fixes & polish
- Smoothed dashboard/session state handling tied to sidebar updates.
- Included the latest AUR packaging metadata update for 0.11.124 in this shipped range.
Packaging / ops
- Bumped all OpenWork package versions to 0.11.125 and refreshed lockfiles for release consistency.
Compare:
https://github.com/different-ai/openwork/compare/v0.11.124...v0.11.125
